mapper.select: select r_regdate, r_content, r_point, m_giver, m_haver, (select m_name from tbl_member where m_id = m_giver) as m_givername, (select m_name from tbl_member where m_id = m_haver) as m_havername from tbl_record where m_giver = #{m_id} or m_haver = #{m_id} order by r_regdate desc limit 5
select count(c.c_num) from tbl_certificate c left outer join tbl_certi_member cm on c.c_num = cm.c_num and cm.m_id = #{m_id}
UPDATE tbl_member SET m_mail = #{m_mail}, m_addr = #{m_addr}, m_tel = #{m_tel}, m_photo = #{m_photo} WHERE m_id = #{m_id}
SELECT sido FROM tbl_zip group by sido
SELECT gugun FROM tbl_zip where sido = #{sido} group by gugun

SELECT m.m_id, m.m_name, m.m_dept, c.c_name, c.c_point, cm.cm_regdate, cm.cm_image, cm.cm_iscomplete, cm.cm_completedate, cm.c_num from tbl_certificate c, tbl_certi_member cm, tbl_member m where c.c_num = cm.c_num and cm.m_id = m.m_id
order by cm.cm_regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT count(*) from tbl_certificate c, tbl_certi_member cm, tbl_member m where c.c_num = cm.c_num and cm.m_id = m.m_id
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_member SET m_fee = m_fee - #{r_point} WHERE m_id = #{m_giver}
